source: iDISC is founded in Barcelona to offer software development and engineering services.
target: Se funda iDISC en Barcelona para ofrecer servicios de ingeniería y desarrollo de software.
x-context-pre: <seg>1987</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>1990</seg>

source: We create the Language Services department to translate and adapt software products, as well as corresponding help and documentation materials into Spanish.
target: Creamos el Departamento de Servicios Lingüísticos para traducir y adaptar al español productos de software y los materiales de documentación y ayuda correspondientes.
x-context-pre: <seg>1990</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>This is how it all starts at language services.</seg>

source: This is how it all starts at language services.
target: Así es como empieza todo en los servicios lingüísticos.
x-context-pre: <seg>We create the Language Services department to translate and adapt software products, as well as corresponding help and documentation materials into Spanish.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>1995</seg>

source: We create a marketing team specialized in computer products, with a particular emphasis on fluency and adaptation to the local market.
target: Creamos un equipo de marketing especializado en productos informáticos, con especial hincapié en la fluidez y la adaptación al mercado local.
x-context-pre: <seg>1995</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>1997</seg>

source: A production office opens in Argentina to handle the demands for the Spanish used in Latin American countries.
target: Se abre una oficina de producción en Argentina para cubrir la demanda del español que se utiliza en los países latinoamericanos.
x-context-pre: <seg>1997</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2010</seg>

source: Processes are implemented to meet ISO 9001 and EN 15038 quality standards.
target: Se implementan procesos para cumplir las normas ISO 9001 y EN 15038.
x-context-pre: <seg>2010</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Certification is achieved.</seg>

source: Certification is achieved.
target: Se obtiene la certificación correspondiente.
x-context-pre: <seg>Processes are implemented to meet ISO 9001 and EN 15038 quality standards.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2011</seg>

source: Teams in Bolivia and Guatemala are set up to cater for native Latin American languages.
target: Se crean equipos en Bolivia y Guatemala para cubrir idiomas nativos latinoamericanos.
x-context-pre: <seg>2011</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Now these rare languages ​​are one of our areas of specialization.</seg>

source: Now these rare languages ​​are one of our areas of specialization.
target: Ahora estos idiomas poco comunes son una de nuestras áreas de especialización.
x-context-pre: <seg>Teams in Bolivia and Guatemala are set up to cater for native Latin American languages.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2012</seg>

source: Strategic teams are established in the United States to satisfy the needs of American companies.
target: Se establecen equipos estratégicos en Estados Unidos para satisfacer las necesidades de las empresas norteamericanas.
x-context-pre: <seg>2012</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2013</seg>

source: A team of project managers is implemented in Mexico City to offer extended hours of service to clients from 8:00 GMT to 24:00 GMT and greater coverage during public holidays.
target: Se implementa un equipo de gestores de proyectos en Ciudad de México para ampliar las horas de servicio ofrecidas a los clientes desde las 8:00 GMT hasta las 24:00 GMT y ofrecer una mayor cobertura durante los días festivos.
x-context-pre: <seg>2013</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2015</seg>

source: A team is set up in Xalapa, Mexico, consisting of a management team and a team of translators.
target: Se crea un equipo en Xalapa, México, formado por un grupo de gestores y un grupo de traductores.
x-context-pre: <seg>2015</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2016</seg>

source: Production office in Porto Alegre opens to provide translations to Brazilian Portuguese.
target: Se abre una oficina de producción en Porto Alegre para ofrecer traducciones al portugués de Brasil.
x-context-pre: <seg>2016</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>2017</seg>

source: ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 17100:2015 certifications replace the previous ISO 9001:2008 and EN 15038:2006.
target: Las certificaciones ISO 9001:2015 e ISO 17100:2015 sustituyen a las certificaciones ISO 9001:2008 y EN 15038:2006 anteriores.
x-context-pre: <seg>2017</seg>

x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>The importance of a good source<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>The more feedback you send to a translation team, the better the translations will be: the more they will reflect your style and brand values.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>In the AV industry, it is common to have non-natives (and non-linguists) writing PRs or other content in English.</seg>

target: En el sector audiovisual, es muy común que personas no nativas (y que no son lingüistas) escriban notas de prensa en inglés.

target: El resultado no suele ser el mejor texto de origen, lo que complica la vida del traductor.
x-context-pre: <seg>In the AV industry, it is common to have non-natives (and non-linguists) writing PRs or other content in English.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Sometimes, the only way to understand what is meant by a sentence is to go back to the client and ask for clarification.</seg>

source: Sometimes, the only way to understand what is meant by a sentence is to go back to the client and ask for clarification.
target: A veces, la única manera de entender qué quiere decir una oración es volver al cliente y pedirle que lo aclare.
x-context-pre: <seg>The result is not always the best source text, and this makes the translator’s life more difficult.</seg>

target: Procure que alguien revise su material original.
x-context-pre: <seg>Sometimes, the only way to understand what is meant by a sentence is to go back to the client and ask for clarification.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Especially if you know that it will have to be translated.</seg>

target: Sobre todo, si sabe que luego se tendrá que traducir.
x-context-pre: <seg>Try to have your source material reviewed.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>If not all of it, at least the high-visibility content.</seg>

target: Si no al completo, como mínimo el contenido con mayor visibilidad.
x-context-pre: <seg>Especially if you know that it will have to be translated.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>If you think that it is already hard to have a good translation done from a good source; then imagine how hard can it be from a bad one.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Are PDF files allowed?<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

source: <bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Are PDF files allowed?<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
target: <bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>¿Se admiten archivos PDF?<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>XML?<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The answer is simple.</seg>

target: La respuesta es sencilla:
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Are PDF files allowed?<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Any format!</seg>

source: Any format!
target: ¡cualquier formato!
x-context-pre: <seg>The answer is simple.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>When you work with an LSP (Languages Service Provider is the name translation agencies use these days), formats are not an issue.</seg>

source: When you work with an LSP (Languages Service Provider is the name translation agencies use these days), formats are not an issue.
target: Cuando trabaja con un proveedor de servicios de idiomas (LSP, por sus siglas en inglés, que es como se denominan las agencias hoy en día), el formato no supone un problema.
x-context-pre: <seg>Any format!</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>There are translation tools that allow us to export the text from almost any format, translate it and then import it back.</seg>

source: There are translation tools that allow us to export the text from almost any format, translate it and then import it back.
target: Existen herramientas de traducción que nos permiten exportar el texto de casi cualquier formato, traducirlo y luego volverlo a importar.
x-context-pre: <seg>When you work with an LSP (Languages Service Provider is the name translation agencies use these days), formats are not an issue.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Yes, PDF files are allowed, although they are not the most recommended format.</seg>

source: Yes, PDF files are allowed, although they are not the most recommended format.
target: Sí, se aceptan archivos PDF, aunque no sea el formato más recomendado.
x-context-pre: <seg>There are translation tools that allow us to export the text from almost any format, translate it and then import it back.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>They require an extraction task before the translation, and will probably have an extra charge.</seg>

source: They require an extraction task before the translation, and will probably have an extra charge.
target: Se necesita realizar una tarea de extracción antes de la traducción, y esto probablemente supone un coste extra.
x-context-pre: <seg>Yes, PDF files are allowed, although they are not the most recommended format.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>So you should always send the editable version of a file to translate if you have it.</seg>

source: So you should always send the editable version of a file to translate if you have it.
target: Por lo tanto, debería enviar siempre la versión editable de un archivo para su traducción si dispone de ella.
x-context-pre: <seg>They require an extraction task before the translation, and will probably have an extra charge.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Even if you have a very specific file format (a subtitling .srt file, for example), just ask your translation partner if they can handle that format before wasting your precious time copying the content into an Excel file.</seg>

source: Even if you have a very specific file format (a subtitling .srt file, for example), just ask your translation partner if they can handle that format before wasting your precious time copying the content into an Excel file.
target: Incluso si tiene un formato de archivo muy específico (un archivo .srt de subtítulos, por ejemplo), simplemente pregunte a su profesional de la traducción de confianza si puede trabajar con ese formato antes de malgastar su preciado tiempo copiando el contenido en un archivo Excel.
x-context-pre: <seg>So you should always send the editable version of a file to translate if you have it.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Yes, this has happened before.</seg>

source: Yes, this has happened before.
target: Sí, esto ya ha ocurrido antes.
x-context-pre: <seg>Even if you have a very specific file format (a subtitling .srt file, for example), just ask your translation partner if they can handle that format before wasting your precious time copying the content into an Excel file.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Communication is the mantra<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

source: <bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Communication is the mantra<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
target: <bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>La comunicación es el mantra.<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
x-context-pre: <seg>Yes, this has happened before.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Communication is the most important aspect for a successful experience when it comes to service providers.</seg>

source: Communication is the most important aspect for a successful experience when it comes to service providers.
target: La comunicación es el aspecto más importante para una conseguir una experiencia satisfactoria cuando se trata de proveedores de servicios.
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Communication is the mantra<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Translation is no exception.</seg>

source: Translation is no exception.
target: La traducción no es una excepción.
x-context-pre: <seg>Communication is the most important aspect for a successful experience when it comes to service providers.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>You are the expert on your brand and your products, so you have to share this information with your translation partner.</seg>

source: You are the expert on your brand and your products, so you have to share this information with your translation partner.
target: Usted es el experto en su marca y en sus productos, así que debe compartir esta información con su profesional de la traducción de confianza.
x-context-pre: <seg>Translation is no exception.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>And your translation partner is the expert on their field, so they have to advise you and guide you on every part of the process.</seg>

source: And your translation partner is the expert on their field, so they have to advise you and guide you on every part of the process.
target: Y su profesional de confianza es el experto en su campo de traducción, por lo que podrá aconsejarle y guiarle en todas las partes del proceso.
x-context-pre: <seg>You are the expert on your brand and your products, so you have to share this information with your translation partner.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Work with agencies that can provide you with global account management, and not just translation or review management; this can help you understand what works best in any situation.</seg>

source: Work with agencies that can provide you with global account management, and not just translation or review management; this can help you understand what works best in any situation.
target: Trabaje con agencias que puedan proporcionarle una gestión de cuentas globales, no solo la gestión de traducciones o revisiones; así podrá comprender qué funciona mejor en cada situación.
x-context-pre: <seg>And your translation partner is the expert on their field, so they have to advise you and guide you on every part of the process.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Just like the kind of advice you would expect from a marketing agency, for example.</seg>

source: Just like the kind of advice you would expect from a marketing agency, for example.
target: Es el tipo de recomendaciones que esperaría de una agencia de marketing, por ejemplo.
x-context-pre: <seg>Work with agencies that can provide you with global account management, and not just translation or review management; this can help you understand what works best in any situation.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>A good account manager can make your life much easier.</seg>

source: A good account manager can make your life much easier.
target: Un buen gestor de cuentas puede facilitarle mucho la vida.
x-context-pre: <seg>Just like the kind of advice you would expect from a marketing agency, for example.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Translation is not negotiable if you want to reach foreign markets, but it can be painful if not managed correctly.</seg>

source: Translation is not negotiable if you want to reach foreign markets, but it can be painful if not managed correctly.
target: La traducción no es negociable si desea llegar a mercados extranjeros, pero puede convertirse en una complicación si no se gestiona correctamente.
x-context-pre: <seg>A good account manager can make your life much easier.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>By taking these few points into account, your experience will run smoothly and the results will certainly stand out.</seg>

source: By taking these few points into account, your experience will run smoothly and the results will certainly stand out.
target: Si tiene en cuenta estos aspectos, todo marchará sobre ruedas y los resultados serán más que notables.
x-context-pre: <seg>Translation is not negotiable if you want to reach foreign markets, but it can be painful if not managed correctly.</seg>

source: Shall we meet at ISE 2020?

x-context-pre: <seg>Shall we meet at ISE 2020?</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>I am Sofia Machado, Key Account Manager for the AV and System Integration sector at iDISC, a translation agency based in Barcelona.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>$contact_headeremail_c</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Soon, I will be in Amsterdam for the ISE 2020.</seg>

target: Dentro de poco estaré en Ámsterdam para el ISE 2020.

x-context-post: <seg>Will you be there?</seg>

target: ¿Asistirá también al evento?
x-context-pre: <seg>Soon, I will be in Amsterdam for the ISE 2020.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>I plan to pass by your booth, and I would like to meet you.</seg>

target: Me gustaría pasarme por su estand y conocerle.
x-context-pre: <seg>Will you be there?</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>We know that one of the biggest concerns companies have is that translators don’t know the AV industry well.</seg>

target: Sabemos que una de las mayores preocupaciones que suelen tener las empresas es que los traductores no conocen muy bien el sector audiovisual.
x-context-pre: <seg>I plan to pass by your booth, and I would like to meet you.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>At iDISC, we have a dedicated and specialized team of translators that can provide you a wide range of services to manage and translate any AV related content into any language.</seg>

source: At iDISC, we have a dedicated and specialized team of translators that can provide you a wide range of services to manage and translate any AV related content into any language.
target: En iDISC, tenemos un equipo de traductores comprometido y especializado que pone a su disposición una amplia gama de servicios para gestionar y traducir cualquier contenido sobre audiovisuales a cualquier idioma.
x-context-pre: <seg>We know that one of the biggest concerns companies have is that translators don’t know the AV industry well.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>We help companies to break down any language or cultural barrier in an easy and effective way.</seg>

source: We help companies to break down any language or cultural barrier in an easy and effective way.
target: Ayudamos a las empresas a romper barreras lingüísticas o culturales de manera sencilla y eficaz.
x-context-pre: <seg>At iDISC, we have a dedicated and specialized team of translators that can provide you a wide range of services to manage and translate any AV related content into any language.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>We would like to learn about the challenges you are facing and how could we make them easier for you.</seg>

source: We would like to learn about the challenges you are facing and how could we make them easier for you.
target: Nos gustaría saber más sobre los desafíos a los que se enfrenta y cómo podríamos ayudarle para que le resultaran más sencillos.
x-context-pre: <seg>We help companies to break down any language or cultural barrier in an easy and effective way.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>I will be in Amsterdam for the whole show, and I am organizing my agenda.</seg>

source: I will be in Amsterdam for the whole show, and I am organizing my agenda.
target: Estaré en Ámsterdam durante todo el evento y estoy organizándome la agenda.
x-context-pre: <seg>We would like to learn about the challenges you are facing and how could we make them easier for you.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Would you like to meet up and have a quick talk?</seg>

source: Would you like to meet up and have a quick talk?
target: ¿Le parecería bien quedar y tener una pequeña charla?
x-context-pre: <seg>I will be in Amsterdam for the whole show, and I am organizing my agenda.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>I look forward to hearing from you.</seg>

source: I look forward to hearing from you.
target: Quedo a la espera de recibir sus noticias.

x-context-post: <seg>Many thanks.</seg>

source: Many thanks.
target: Muchas gracias.

x-context-post: <seg>Best,</seg>

source: Best,
target: Atentamente,

x-context-post: <seg>So are the challenges that will mark the future of this industry.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Global boating industry is showing a constant growth in the past years.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1'><rpr id="2"></bpt>In a world where environmental consciousness is growing, t<ept i='1'></rpr id="2" transform="close"></ept>he search for more sustainable products is a requirement that brands cannot oversee.</seg>

target: El tipo de compradores también evoluciona y se está diversificando.
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1'><rpr id="2"></bpt>In a world where environmental consciousness is growing, t<ept i='1'></rpr id="2" transform="close"></ept>he search for more sustainable products is a requirement that brands cannot oversee.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Millennials will be the next generation of consumers and should not be forgotten.</seg>

source: Millennials will be the next generation of consumers and should not be forgotten.
target: Los mileniales serán la próxima generación de consumidores, por lo que hay que tenerlos en cuenta.
x-context-pre: <seg>The type of buyers is also evolving and diversifying.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>To reach them, manufacturers and distributors need to speak their language and use their channels.</seg>

target: Para llegar a ellos, los fabricantes y los distribuidores tienen que hablar su idioma y utilizar sus canales.
x-context-pre: <seg>Millennials will be the next generation of consumers and should not be forgotten.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>It has never been so important to use social media to share content.</seg>

source: It has never been so important to use social media to share content.
target: Ahora es más importante que nunca utilizar redes sociales para compartir contenido.

x-context-post: <seg>Traveling is one of the favorite activities of modern societies.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>“The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.”<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

target: <bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>“El progreso de la tecnología consiste en integrarla en nuestra vida cotidiana de modo que ni nos demos cuenta de que está ahí”.<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>IT-Specialized Translation Services<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>Bill Gates<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

source: <bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>Bill Gates<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
target: <bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>Bill Gates<ept i='1'>{}</ept>
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>“The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.”<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Information Technology (IT) has become an intrinsic part of our lives.</seg>

source: Information Technology (IT) has become an intrinsic part of our lives.
target: La tecnología de la información (TI) se ha convertido en una parte intrínseca de nuestras vidas.
x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='italic'>{}</bpt>Bill Gates<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>In fact, most of us do not remember how life was before it.</seg>

source: In fact, most of us do not remember how life was before it.
target: De hecho, la mayoría de nosotros no recordamos cómo era la vida antes de la llegada de la tecnología.
x-context-pre: <seg>Information Technology (IT) has become an intrinsic part of our lives.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Some say that it is the fabric of modern life and that technological breakthroughs such as augmented reality, artificial intelligence, Internet of things, or 3D printing will determine our future.</seg>

source: Some say that it is the fabric of modern life and that technological breakthroughs such as augmented reality, artificial intelligence, Internet of things, or 3D printing will determine our future.
target: Hay quien dice que es el entramado de la sociedad moderna y que algunas revoluciones tecnológicas, como la realidad aumentada, la inteligencia artificial, el internet de las cosas y la impresión 3D, determinarán nuestro futuro.
x-context-pre: <seg>In fact, most of us do not remember how life was before it.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Still, moving on-premises to cloud or managing costs and information security are challenges the IT industry should not ignore.</seg>

source: Still, moving on-premises to cloud or managing costs and information security are challenges the IT industry should not ignore.
target: Sin embargo, esto conlleva retos que el sector de la TI no puede rehuir: trasladar los sistemas locales a la nube y gestionar los costes y la seguridad de la información.
x-context-pre: <seg>Some say that it is the fabric of modern life and that technological breakthroughs such as augmented reality, artificial intelligence, Internet of things, or 3D printing will determine our future.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>IT innovation has connected the world and has contributed immensely to the internationalization of the markets.</seg>

source: IT innovation has connected the world and has contributed immensely to the internationalization of the markets.
target: De todos modos, las innovaciones en TI han conectado el mundo y han contribuido enormemente a internacionalizar los mercados,
x-context-pre: <seg>Still, moving on-premises to cloud or managing costs and information security are challenges the IT industry should not ignore.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Something that would not have been possible without translation.</seg>

source: Something that would not have been possible without translation.
target: lo cual no habría sido posible sin la traducción.
x-context-pre: <seg>IT innovation has connected the world and has contributed immensely to the internationalization of the markets.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>IT is one of the most important industries for translation companies, and one of the most demanding as well.</seg>

source: IT is one of the most important industries for translation companies, and one of the most demanding as well.
target: La TI es uno de los sectores más importantes para las empresas de traducción, y también uno de los más exigentes.
x-context-pre: <seg>Something that would not have been possible without translation.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Extremely time-sensitive projects like continuous UI updates in Agile methodology, with same-day turnaround, or technical contents like complex architecture network systems, mobile apps or APIs are some examples of what an IT translation team has to deal with every day.</seg>

source: Extremely time-sensitive projects like continuous UI updates in Agile methodology, with same-day turnaround, or technical contents like complex architecture network systems, mobile apps or APIs are some examples of what an IT translation team has to deal with every day.
target: Cada día, los equipos de traducción especializados en TI deben enfrentarse a retos como traducir proyectos urgentes que se deben entregar el mismo día (por ejemplo, actualizaciones continuas de interfaces de usuario con metodología Agile) o contenidos técnicos (ya sean sistemas de red de arquitectura compleja, aplicaciones móviles o APIs), y estos solo son algunos ejemplos.
x-context-pre: <seg>IT is one of the most important industries for translation companies, and one of the most demanding as well.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>The damage it can do to a company’s brand has never been higher.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>And all buyers are liable to judge the quality of your product or service just by the quality of your translated content.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Online, the translated content is the only indicator that can be gauged by a potential buyer.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>This represents a challenge as some companies see professional translation as an expense to avoid, especially during a time of crisis.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>And all buyers are liable to judge the quality of your product or service just by the quality of your translated content.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>If the budget for translation is too small to have the whole process done by native professional translators, at the very least, the final review should be done by them to ensure the ultimate quality.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>This represents a challenge as some companies see professional translation as an expense to avoid, especially during a time of crisis.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg>Most companies in the Electronics industry understand the importance of having their content translated into the languages of the markets in which they are operating or intend to operate.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>5 keys to choose a long-lasting translation partner<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Most already have their website translated, as well as their most important material, but few have a proper solution in place.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Most companies in the Electronics industry understand the importance of having their content translated into the languages of the markets in which they are operating or intend to operate.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>When asked why they do not work with translation professionals, or why they are not happy with their current translation partner, the most common answer is not “the price”.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Most already have their website translated, as well as their most important material, but few have a proper solution in place.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg><bpt i='1' type='bold'>{}</bpt>Identify your needs and scope the project<ept i='1'>{}</ept></seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Let us have a look at the 5 key points to build a long-lasting and effective relationship with your translation partner.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Before you start looking for a translation partner, some internal work needs to be done to define what you want to translate, who will be in charge of the project inside the company, how much that person knows about translation, the budget you want to spend, etc.</seg>

source: Before you start looking for a translation partner, some internal work needs to be done to define what you want to translate, who will be in charge of the project inside the company, how much that person knows about translation, the budget you want to spend, etc.
target: Antes de empezar a buscar un partner de traducción, se debe realizar cierto trabajo interno para definir qué se quiere traducir, qué persona de la empresa se encargará del proyecto, cuánto sabe esa persona sobre el ámbito de la traducción, qué presupuesto se quiere destinar, etc.

x-context-post: <seg>The more you define these aspects internally, the easier it will be for your translation partner or candidate to understand and meet your expectations.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>The final result will more accurately reflect your style and brand values.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg>In a world where digital is the most visible content, your brand shows in everything you write: your software, your instructions manual and, of course, your marketing material.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>You will see the difference in the translation.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Many large international companies have an internal dedicated translation department, with translators and project managers that frequently come from the translation industry.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg>In some cases, they translate everything and, in others, they mainly supervise and review the quality of their external translation partners.</seg>

source: In some cases, they translate everything and, in others, they mainly supervise and review the quality of their external translation partners.
target: En algunos casos lo traducen todo, mientras que en otros se encargan principalmente de supervisar y revisar la calidad de los partners de traducción externos.
x-context-pre: <seg>Many large international companies have an internal dedicated translation department, with translators and project managers that frequently come from the translation industry.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Some of these in-house translators work as Language Leads, i. e., linguists who have long-standing experience in the project and can act as custodian of the terminology, the accuracy and the style.</seg>

source: Some of these in-house translators work as Language Leads, i. e., linguists who have long-standing experience in the project and can act as custodian of the terminology, the accuracy and the style.
target: Algunos de estos traductores internos trabajan como Language Leads, es decir, lingüistas que tienen una amplia experiencia en el proyecto y pueden actuar como custodio de la terminología, de la corrección y del estilo.
x-context-pre: <seg>In some cases, they translate everything and, in others, they mainly supervise and review the quality of their external translation partners.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Small companies or start-ups do not usually have such an internal structure.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Some of these in-house translators work as Language Leads, i. e., linguists who have long-standing experience in the project and can act as custodian of the terminology, the accuracy and the style.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>That is why a reliable translation partner should supply this need.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Small companies or start-ups do not usually have such an internal structure.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Their most experienced translator can assume that monitoring role, and provide quality assurance aligned with your expectations.</seg>

x-context-post: <seg>Communication is the answer to the biggest concern Electronic companies have when outsourcing their translations: how can my translation partner know my brand style, technical requirements and preferred terminology?</seg>

x-context-post: <seg>Just by talking to them, and also by listening to their advice, like an open circuit that is never complete or interrupted.</seg>

x-context-pre: <seg>Connecting your expertise in your field with their knowledge in theirs will ensure the best communication flow.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Your relationship with your translation partner should be similar to the one you have with your marketing agency, for example.</seg>

target: La relación con el partner de traducción debe ser similar a la que se mantiene, por ejemplo, con la agencia de marketing.

x-context-pre: <seg>Your relationship with your translation partner should be similar to the one you have with your marketing agency, for example.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The only way of having a long-lasting and worthwhile relationship with a translation partner is through on-going communication in both directions.</seg>

source: The only way of having a long-lasting and worthwhile relationship with a translation partner is through on-going communication in both directions.
target: La única manera de mantener una relación duradera y que merezca la pena con un partner de traducción es a través de una comunicación continua en ambas direcciones.
x-context-pre: <seg>Each company has its own unique terminology and style.</seg>

source: COLORS @ iDISC.
target: LOS COLORES EN iDISC:
x-context-post: <seg>The reason explained</seg>

source: The reason explained
target: el quid de la cuestión
x-context-pre: <seg>COLORS @ iDISC.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Colors have strong impact on humans.</seg>

source: Colors have strong impact on humans.
target: Los colores tienen un gran efecto en las personas.
x-context-pre: <seg>The reason explained</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Some say that dogs only see in black and white, and while this might have brought us some masterpieces in the early days of photography (and for the lovers of postmodern art), we, as humans, still need the vibrant and cheerful strokes of colors that enlighten life.</seg>

source: Red is often associated with love, passion, success, and lust.
target: El rojo suele asociarse al amor, a la pasión, al éxito y a la lujuria.
x-context-pre: <seg>Some say that dogs only see in black and white, and while this might have brought us some masterpieces in the early days of photography (and for the lovers of postmodern art), we, as humans, still need the vibrant and cheerful strokes of colors that enlighten life.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Blue is the color of water, the oceans, and the sky.</seg>

source: Blue is the color of water, the oceans, and the sky.
target: El azul es el color del agua, del mar y del cielo.
x-context-pre: <seg>Red is often associated with love, passion, success, and lust.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>And it often symbolizes serenity, stability, inspiration, or wisdom.</seg>

source: And it often symbolizes serenity, stability, inspiration, or wisdom.
target: Además, suele ser símbolo de serenidad, estabilidad, inspiración y sabiduría.
x-context-pre: <seg>Blue is the color of water, the oceans, and the sky.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Yellow is the color often associated with sunshine, creativity, sociability, and joy.</seg>

source: Yellow is the color often associated with sunshine, creativity, sociability, and joy.
target: El amarillo suele estar asociado al sol, a la creatividad, a la sociabilidad y a la alegría.
x-context-pre: <seg>And it often symbolizes serenity, stability, inspiration, or wisdom.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Pink might remind us of softness, femininity, sweetness, and love.</seg>

source: Pink might remind us of softness, femininity, sweetness, and love.
target: El rosa evoca dulzura, feminidad, amabilidad y amor.
x-context-pre: <seg>Yellow is the color often associated with sunshine, creativity, sociability, and joy.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Green is the color of hope in some cultures, or envy in others, but most often used to represent nature, healing, or fertility, since it is such a dominant color in nature.</seg>

source: Green is the color of hope in some cultures, or envy in others, but most often used to represent nature, healing, or fertility, since it is such a dominant color in nature.
target: El verde simboliza la esperanza en algunas culturas y la envidia en otras, pero suele utilizarse para representar la naturaleza, la curación o la fertilidad, ya que es un color predominante en la naturaleza.
x-context-pre: <seg>Pink might remind us of softness, femininity, sweetness, and love.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Black is the color of death, grief or evil, but it is so elegant in a night dress or tuxedo…  And white, the color of perfection, faith, innocence, softness, and cleanliness, might otherwise be a headache to clean if you spill coffee on your immaculate business shirt.</seg>

source: Indeed, colors require a strong localization component which, thus far, is not often taken into account.
target: De hecho, los colores precisan de un componente importante de localización que muchas veces no se tiene en cuenta.
x-context-pre: <seg>Black is the color of death, grief or evil, but it is so elegant in a night dress or tuxedo…  And white, the color of perfection, faith, innocence, softness, and cleanliness, might otherwise be a headache to clean if you spill coffee on your immaculate business shirt.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Since color is a highly important factor in the visual look of products, as well as in brand recognition, color psychology has become a crucial milestone to marketing specialists.</seg>

source: Since color is a highly important factor in the visual look of products, as well as in brand recognition, color psychology has become a crucial milestone to marketing specialists.
target: Puesto que el color es un factor muy importante para la imagen de los productos y el reconocimiento de las marcas, la psicología del color se ha convertido en un hito para los especialistas en marketing.
x-context-pre: <seg>Indeed, colors require a strong localization component which, thus far, is not often taken into account.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Color decisions can influence both direct communications to the audience, as well as underlying messages in secondary brand values and attributes in any marketing campaign.</seg>

source: Color decisions can influence both direct communications to the audience, as well as underlying messages in secondary brand values and attributes in any marketing campaign.
target: La elección de los colores puede influir en las comunicaciones directas con el público, así como en los mensajes subyacentes de los atributos y los valores de marca secundarios de una campaña de marketing.
x-context-pre: <seg>Since color is a highly important factor in the visual look of products, as well as in brand recognition, color psychology has become a crucial milestone to marketing specialists.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The general model of color psychology relies on some basic principles:</seg>

source: The general model of color psychology relies on some basic principles:
target: La psicología del color se rige por unos principios básicos:
x-context-pre: <seg>Color decisions can influence both direct communications to the audience, as well as underlying messages in secondary brand values and attributes in any marketing campaign.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Colors carry specific meanings that only expert SMEs and localizers can wisely assess.</seg>

source: Colors carry specific meanings that only expert SMEs and localizers can wisely assess.
target: Los colores tienen significados específicos que solo los entendidos en la materia y los localizadores expertos pueden valorar sabiamente.
x-context-pre: <seg>The general model of color psychology relies on some basic principles:</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Color-subconscious impact is either based on learned meaning or biologically innate meaning, so, in fact, a trained native expert will be required.</seg>

source: Color-subconscious impact is either based on learned meaning or biologically innate meaning, so, in fact, a trained native expert will be required.
target: El efecto de los colores en el subconsciente está basado en un significado aprendido o un significado innato, por lo que hace falta un experto nativo con formación para que la traducción produzca el mismo efecto en el sujeto de destino.
x-context-pre: <seg>Colors carry specific meanings that only expert SMEs and localizers can wisely assess.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The perception of a color triggers an automatic evaluation by the viewer, who will recall preconceived ideas and behaviors that will be hard to overlook.</seg>

source: The perception of a color triggers an automatic evaluation by the viewer, who will recall preconceived ideas and behaviors that will be hard to overlook.
target: Cuando una persona percibe un color, hace una valoración automática y le vienen a la mente comportamientos e ideas preconcebidas que son difíciles de obviar.
x-context-pre: <seg>Color-subconscious impact is either based on learned meaning or biologically innate meaning, so, in fact, a trained native expert will be required.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The meaning of color and consequent effects have a certain relation to context.</seg>

source: The meaning of color and consequent effects have a certain relation to context.
target: El significado de los colores y sus efectos guardan cierta relación con el contexto.
x-context-pre: <seg>The perception of a color triggers an automatic evaluation by the viewer, who will recall preconceived ideas and behaviors that will be hard to overlook.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Having said that, if you ever wondered why teams at iDISC have such strange names, BMT, RMT, KMT, OMT, YMT, PMT, I have to tell you that these are colors.</seg>

source: Having said that, if you ever wondered why teams at iDISC have such strange names, BMT, RMT, KMT, OMT, YMT, PMT, I have to tell you that these are colors.
target: Dicho esto, si alguna vez te has preguntado por qué los equipos de iDISC tienen unos nombres tan raros (BMT, RMT, KMT, OMT, YMT y PMT), te diré que esta nomenclatura se basa en las iniciales de los colores en inglés.
x-context-pre: <seg>The meaning of color and consequent effects have a certain relation to context.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>BMT is the team that takes care of major localization projects, big ones, so they are Blue, the color of serenity and wisdom.</seg>

source: BMT is the team that takes care of major localization projects, big ones, so they are Blue, the color of serenity and wisdom.
target: BMT es el equipo que se encarga de los proyectos de localización de gran volumen con extensos requisitos y de gran exigencia. De ahí la B de blue, el azul que simboliza la serenidad y la sabiduría.
x-context-pre: <seg>Having said that, if you ever wondered why teams at iDISC have such strange names, BMT, RMT, KMT, OMT, YMT, PMT, I have to tell you that these are colors.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>RMT is Red, they oversee projects that are passionate, strong in branding, with quick turnarounds and hectic.</seg>

source: RMT is Red, they oversee projects that are passionate, strong in branding, with quick turnarounds and hectic.
target: RMT viene de red y designa al equipo rojo encargado de los proyectos más apasionantes y frenéticos, de marcas con fuerte personalidad y plazos de entrega reducidos.
x-context-pre: <seg>BMT is the team that takes care of major localization projects, big ones, so they are Blue, the color of serenity and wisdom.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Sometimes a bit crazy too.</seg>

source: Sometimes a bit crazy too.
target: De vez en cuando, les caen proyectos de lo más locos.
x-context-pre: <seg>RMT is Red, they oversee projects that are passionate, strong in branding, with quick turnarounds and hectic.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>OMT is Orange, the color of round and invigorating projects.</seg>

source: Some say that dogs only see in black and white, and while this might have brought us some masterpieces in the early days of photography (and for the lovers of postmodern art), we, as humans, still need the vibrant and cheerful strokes of colors that enlighten life.
target: Se dice que los perros solo ven en blanco y negro, y está claro que los inicios de la fotografía nos dejaron verdaderas obras maestras en blanco y negro (especialmente para los amantes del arte posmoderno). Sin embargo, los humanos necesitamos la energía y la alegría de los colores para iluminar a todo aquello que nos rodea.
x-context-pre: <seg>Colors have strong impact on humans.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Red is often associated with love, passion, success, and lust.</seg>

source: Black is the color of death, grief or evil, but it is so elegant in a night dress or tuxedo…  And white, the color of perfection, faith, innocence, softness, and cleanliness, might otherwise be a headache to clean if you spill coffee on your immaculate business shirt.
target: El negro es el color de la muerte, del duelo o del mal, pero resulta tan elegante para un vestido o un esmoquin… Por último, el blanco simboliza la perfección, la fe, la inocencia, la dulzura y la limpieza, aunque a veces lo maldices si te manchas de café tu inmaculada camisa del trabajo.
x-context-pre: <seg>Green is the color of hope in some cultures, or envy in others, but most often used to represent nature, healing, or fertility, since it is such a dominant color in nature.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Indeed, colors require a strong localization component which, thus far, is not often taken into account.</seg>

source: Voice-over is a production technique where a voice is used in radio or television, advertising or in documentaries.
target: La voz en off es una técnica de producción en la que se utiliza una voz en radio o televisión, en publicidad o en documentales.
x-context-pre: <seg>VOICE-OVER</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The voice-over is read from a script and may be spoken by someone who appears as a narrator or overlapping the original actors voices.</seg>

target: La voz en off se lee a partir de un guion y la pone un narrador o se superpone a las voces de los actores originales.
x-context-pre: <seg>Voice-over is a production technique where a voice is used in radio or television, advertising or in documentaries.</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>Synchronous dialogue, where the voice-over is heard at the same pace as the action taking place, remains the most common technique in voice-overs.</seg>

source: Communication in multilingual environments is now easier with Zoom and its interpreting option.
target: La comunicación en entornos multilingües ahora es más fácil que nunca gracias a Zoom y su opción de interpretación.

source: On<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>Tuesday the 23rd of October<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>Francoise Bajon of Version internationale, Christian Schwendy of Gemino, Xavier Maza of iDISC and Marce van Velden of Global textware, will lead a workshop called "MT Post-Editing:
target: El<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>martes 23 de octubre,<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>Francoise Bajon de Version Internationale, Christian Schwendy de Gemino, Xavier Maza de iDISC y Marce van Velden de Global Textware, impartirán un taller llamado "MT Post-Editing:
x-context-pre: <seg><ph><br /></ph><ph><br /></ph><ph><br /></ph></seg>

source: The Language Service Provider Perspective" (08:45-10:30, Room 2A 1) at tekom trade fair in Wiesbaden, Germany.
target: La perspectiva del proveedor de servicios lingüísticos" (08:45-10:30, Sala 2A 1) en la feria comercial Tekom en Wiesbaden, Alemania.
x-context-pre: <seg>On<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>Tuesday the 23rd of October<ph><mq:ch val="nbsp" /></ph>Francoise Bajon of Version internationale, Christian Schwendy of Gemino, Xavier Maza of iDISC and Marce van Velden of Global textware, will lead a workshop called "MT Post-Editing:</seg>
x-context-post: <seg>The discussion will tackle the different phases of the revision of texts obtained by making use of machine translation, report examples taken from real projects and also present the results of a survey about Post-Editing carried out among ELIA members.</seg>

source: The discussion will tackle the different phases of the revision of texts obtained by making use of machine translation, report examples taken from real projects and also present the results of a survey about Post-Editing carried out among ELIA members.
target: La discusión abordará las diferentes fases de la revisión de textos obtenidos haciendo uso de la traducción automática, con ejemplos tomados de proyectos reales y también presentará los resultados de una encuesta sobre posedición realizada entre los miembros de ELIA.
x-context-pre: <seg>The Language Service Provider Perspective" (08:45-10:30, Room 2A 1) at tekom trade fair in Wiesbaden, Germany.</seg>
